Agnieszka

Principal Investigator

Home PageEmailGitHub

Agnieszka is a cognitive psychologist and received her PhD at the University of Z端rich, Switzerland. She then worked with Michael Esterman and Joseph De Gutis at the Boston Attention and Learning Laboratory, affiliated with the medical schools of Boston University and Harvard University. She studies the cognitive and neural mechanisms underlying attention and emotion processing.
